name: The Executrix
description:
Travel to 1860s London to stay in the empty home of a late great uncle, while serving as executrix of the estate.  A dark thriller with autumn tones, this short game mixes platforming and logic puzzles within a continuous narrative.

Please use headphones for the best experience.  Watch out for a small secret area in the game, just for fun.  Created in 24 days for Themed Horror Game Jam #9 - Halloween Edition.

All artwork, animation, programming, music, and fonts by me.  Helpful programming tutorials credited in-line.

Control option 1:

Movement: arrows (crouch and crouch-walk using down arrow)

Jump: C

Glide while in air (once enabled): X

Skip entire cutscene: S

Control option 2:

Movement: WASD (crouch and crouch-walk using S)

Jump: J

Glide while in air (once enabled): K

Skip entire cutscene: S
